entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tadoule Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:55 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
